import React from "react" import { MapContainer as LeafletMap, TileLayer, Circle, Popup} from "react-leaflet" import {showDataOnMap} from "./util.js" import ChangeView from "./ChangeView.js" import "./Map.css" function Map(props) { return (
{props.countries?.map(country => (
{country.country}
Cases: {country.cases}
Recovered: {country.recovered}
Deaths: {country.deaths}
))}
) } export default Map
